review: This game is heavily based on luck, the RNG gods will most likely screw around with you before you lose.NEVER play a drinking game with this.make sure to have enough good faith and persistance.Is incredibly fun, 9/10.May the numbers forever be in your favour.

review: Incredably difficult.Not much else to say about it.Still recommend though.
Had me scared to death in 10 minutes, effective at horror.Definitly play if you're into that stuff.
